title: Flex Ranked Placements
body:
Hi,

I just need to understand how I demoted from Diamond 5 (ranked flex) to silver 2 just after one match. I did not get to Diamond 5, vsing silvers or golds. I got to the rank vsing high plats and high diamonds. Pls explain.

replies.body: Prob because you were gold in solo q last season
flex ranked isn't supposed to be based on anything's MMR

The seeding and matchmaking of the original placements were completely messed up and noone got placed accurately, the change as far as I can tell tried to place people roughly where they would be after a normal set of placements based on their solo/duo rank from S6 (i.e placements after a soft reset using that rank as the base).

Having no seeding was what got us into this mess with Diamonds in Bronze and Bronzes in Plat to begin with. Any updates will be posted on the thread Maraudaur linked.

it sightly goes off your solo q ranking and they did an update today to put people where they should be, if you were gold last season and got placed in plat after your first 10 games, then something went wrong. its still pre-season anyways so your rank is still gona get reset.
what the fuck. I got placed in bronze 5 and climbed all the way to silver 5 and now i'm back in bronze 4 after the stupid placement thingy.
Hey guys I know it's confusing, check the latest updates here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/u2iR6nTU-ranked-flex-match-making-issues
